Plot: A film that excavates layers of myth and memory to find the elusive truth at the core of a family of storytellers.
Title: Stories We Tell
Actors: Michael Polley, Harry Gulkin, Susy Buchan, John Buchan
tomatoConsensus: In Stories We Tell, Sarah Polley plays with the documentary format to explore the nature of memory and storytelling, crafting a thoughtful, compelling narrative that unfolds like a mystery.
